programme.title: The Art Scene
programme.desc: If food was a religion, many Singaporeans would have followed it as a faith, How Singaporeans made cuisine culture as an art form? Many more delicious questions will be answered in this episode of The Art Scene- The Art of Cuisine.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating it has claimed the lives of millions. Using incredible archive and footages, We'll relive these weather spectacles, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S21

programme.title: CAMOKAKIS: Whole Lot Fall In!

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett and Jett Pet are called to Stockholm, Sweden, to deliver a special kid-friendly smartphone so a girl named Lily can keep in touch with her fried, Karin, during a snowstorm. The storm clears and Karin and her Mom try to get to Lily's house in their cocky new car, Bjorn. Bjorn crashes in the snow and the SWs have to fly into action to get them all back to safety.

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: After releasing the Trix from their space-time prison, Valtor asks for the three witches' help to get the Wishing Star. Meanwhile, at Alfea, Twinkly visits the Winx. The rulers of Lumenia - Argen and Dorana - need their help: with their powers, the fairies will enter the Starcase, but there, unexpectedly, they will be attacked by the Trix...

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S4

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: All of Ollipolis is on the hunt for the famed, elusive Abominable Snowman. When Rover goes missing, they suspect the monster may have taken him. The Shifty Squares go on an online shopping spree and buy too much stuff, causing a huge delivery pile-up.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. programme.title: The Flying Chef
programme.desc: Combining his love for food, adventure, scuba diving and travel, world renowned Australian chef Nathan Huxham takes us on a culinary adventure through the remote islands of Indonesia. Deadly creatures, vibrant marine life and spicy street food. Experience full-flavoured local cuisines, exotic cocktails and some of the world's best scuba diving locations in this new travel adventure cooking series, The Flying Chef.

programme.desc: 屠妖节又称“排节灯”，是欢庆善良战胜邪恶，光明驱走黑暗的日子。每逢屠妖节，家家户户点灯火驱除妖孽，并守护人们诚心许下的大小愿望。一起体会这节日的传统习俗及窥探不同背景的印度同胞如何准备节日食品.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺

programme.title: 寻味顺德
programme.desc: 这是一个古老和现代奇妙交融的地方。千年围垦孕育出丰饶的桑基鱼塘，一百年前缫丝业的繁盛让它富甲一方，今天，这里出产的家电用品改变着全球数十亿人的生活。然而，这片土地最富盛名的，永远是美食。顺德，以食物为遗传密码，让自己区别于世界上任何一个地方.

programme.title: 寻花探草 S6

programme.title: 小屋大作
programme.desc: 不同年纪的女人对于房屋需求也有所不同！本周将迎来由黄嫊方饰演的贵妇姐姐和萧歆霓饰演的年轻妹妹一起来看公寓！妹妹单纯活泼、热爱新事物，姐姐要求多又爱奢华，陈汉玮饰演的房屋经纪 Barry Koo 将介绍两间风格大不同的两房式公寓，看看是否能成功说服两姐妹，顺利成交.
